methods.name: findPascalSequence
methods.comment: Looks for Pascal strings given a sequence of bytes that represent a sequence of ascii chars.

params.name: buf
params.comment: the Memory buffer containing the bytes that make up the string.

params.name: sequence
params.comment:
the sequence that specifies the start, end, and type of ascii sequence (i.e. ascii,
 unicode16).  This method looks for both 2 byte and 1 byte leading pascal lengths both before
 and at the beginning of the given sequence.

return.comment:
a new sequence that has been adjusted  to represent a pascal string or null if
 a pascal string was not found.
